name: node.iterator.micro
description: node command line iterator - reads the contents of actions.txt line-per-line and performs an http.get command on each of them. if the action line starts with a # / sharp sign then it will be ignored. the application fetches the contents of the actions.txt file every second so if a new action is detected it will be ran immediately. minimum sleep time per action is 1 second.
author: darkcolonist@gmail.com
